finding creative solutions to challenges all of which get combined from time to time his many years of experience in care of elderly people has led him to believe that shawls are highly undervalued as a functional part of any person s wardrobe especially in his prayer shawl designs he strives to find a balance between simplicity clarity and engaging knitting rhythms his recent fixation with figuring out how to knit finger labyrinths has resulted in a few labyrinth-based designs for the more adventurous knitter he hopes his prayer shawl designs help you find your pace and deepen your love
